text:
Hi all, I am about to start development of a Marketplace app which are going to sync data from an external system Fortnox to HubSpot. The use case is to update Contacts and Companies.

I read a bit about Datasync, but how do I register such an App and how to start?

Thanks! :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi <@U01L6S710JD> - out of curiosity what is it in particular you need integrated on top of what data sync is syncing?
Start with creating an App Developer Account and you can start building your app <https://developers.HubSpot.com/get-started>
Or if you want to do it the easy way you can use pandaflow which is a powerful integration builder
